details:
This module enables you to monitor and manage any number of remote Drupal sites and aggregate useful information for administrators in a central dashboard.

The modules (DRD and DRD Agent) encrypt the data which is exchanged between them but in order to do so, they use the PHP serialize/unserialize functions instead of the json\_encode/json\_decode combination. As the unserialize function is called on unauthenticated content, this introduces a PHP object injection vulnerability.
